name: Nidoqueen

ability.name: Flower Field
ability.effect: At the end of your turn, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Basic Pokemon.

attacks.name: Playful Shove
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, you can choose one of them to be the new Active Pokemon after dealing damage.

flavor: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokemon will shield its children from any kind of attack.
